name: Entrance Hall
description: A grand entrance hall with marble floors and a dusty chandelier. Faded portraits line the walls. In the centre of the hall sprawls an enormous wooden staircase

interactables.name: chandelier
interactables.description: A crystal chandelier hanging from the high ceiling, covered in cobwebs.
interactables.interaction: You examine the chandelier closely. Despite the dust, you can still see its former magnificence. Some crystals seem loose...

interactables.name: portraits
interactables.description: Stern-looking portraits of people in antiquated clothing.
interactables.interaction: Looking closer at the portraits, you notice they all share the same striking green eyes. The dates beneath them span over 200 years.
